description:
When the powder sprays, it’s the Swisswool Piz Segnas Jacket’s time to shine. Streamlined to focus on what’s most important and yet still highly functional, this lightweight, casual-cut insulated jacket provides cozy warmth under a hardshell even in midwinter conditions. With its 90g/m² swisswool padding on the front, back, shoulders and sleeve exteriors, it is one of the warmer under- jackets.

On the sides, sleeve interiors and underarms, we use a lighter 60g/m² lining – this means the jacket offers optimum freedom of movement, the best microclimate and is can be compactly packed. Its quilted, elastic and breathable tec stretch outer material stands up reliably to wind and weather. For the sake of the environment, the Swisswool Piz Segnas Jacket is PFC-free, climate-neutral and made in Europe.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Piz Segnas Jacket - Mens
